description: A pre-Roman and Roman site in southern Sardinia.
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Pula

 
Pausanias attributes the foundation of Nora to a group of Iberians under Norax.

properties.title: OSM location of Nora archaeological area

history.comment: cleaned up references; added MANTO and wikidata references provided by the MANTO team; added vici.org reference
create DARMC citation to preserve cross-project linkage after retracting DARMC location
add ToposText reference provided by bkiesling
edited description, added connection and refs
Location updates and tags from Johan Ahlfeldt's (jahlfeldt) Digital Atlas of the Roman Empire in October 2012
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
New locations, coordinates, and metadata from Harvard's DARMC project. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceUpgradesAndMigrations
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
Reimported full way geometry and updated provenance
